page.title: 06Orchard and house
page.content: In Vicarage Lane there is an Orchard. It covers 8 acres of land. He has 2 pear trees, 3 victoria plum trees. 1 green gage and 18 apple trees. They have been grafting apple trees for 6,000 years. They have also got 62 other sorts of trees. He has for bee hives buf one is not in use. The queen bee and her swarm live four weeks in the summer and all winter. He did keep geese but they got rid of them because they pulled the washing off the line, stamped on it and made it dirty. He has one of the rarest plants in England which is called woand. Woand is a kind of dye. You put it in the water and it dyes the material clear. If you hang it on the line it goes blue. The Ancient Britans used it to dye their faces.
